summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Editorial Decision Statistics Platform MVP. All backend APIs (17/17) working perfectly. Frontend fully functional with analytics dashboard, language toggle (EN/PT/ES), and Google OAuth integration. Sample data properly seeded with 500 submissions, 10 publishers, 100 journals.
passed_tests: All 17 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Landing page loads with hero section and CTA buttons
Analytics dashboard displays charts and aggregated statistics
Tab navigation works (Overview, Publishers, Journals, Scientific Areas)
Login page renders with Google OAuth button
Decision distribution pie chart displays data
Reviewer distribution bar chart displays data
Publisher analytics with transparency/review depth scores
No error messages found on any page
Sample data properly seeded (500 submissions, 10 publishers, 100 journals)
